chunks.en: [Giving away codes] AI-powered English sentence learning tool.
English Cutter, an AI-powered English sentence learning tool.

The website is www.wordflow.click

Some say that to learn phonetics, you must pronounce words; to learn words, you must understand sentences. This is similar to how machines learn languages. Machines don't look up dictionaries or memorize words. To make a machine understand the meaning of a word, you only need to show it how the word is used in a sentence. The famous masked language model (MLM) hides the word and lets the machine look at the context to infer the meaning.
However, most English learning software for people today, although providing example sentences, relies on repeated viewing of words for memorization. So, I created a sentence-based memory software.

## 1. Understand English Sentences with Cutter

One problem I encountered when I was in school was that I had memorized English words many times and learned grammar many times, but I still couldn't understand long and difficult sentences. Later, I started practicing learning English through sentences, and I started using a method to break down sentences, decomposing complex long sentences into main components and modifiers to clarify the sentence structure. The general rule is to identify three long structures: clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs, then mark the parts of speech to find adjectives and adverbs, and finally mark parallel structures.
For the specific method, a former New Oriental teacher on Bilibili [å‰æ–°ä¸œæ–¹è€å¸ˆ](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1TY4y1W7aZ/) has a good explanation, you can check it out.

Practice has proven it to be effective, but the process of breaking down sentences takes a lot of time. Moreover, in the learning process, accurately identifying various clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs is quite difficult for beginners.

Therefore, I created a tool that can automatically identify clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs in sentences and mark the parts of speech, which can save a lot of time and allow for a more accurate understanding of sentence structure.

## 2. Practice Cut Sentences

After splitting the sentences using the above method, I conveniently created an exercise function, which is to cover all the words and dictate the meaning of the words according to the phonetics and Chinese meaning.

chunks.en: I will @ the lucky friends, and the "V2EX > Reminder System" will notify you at that time. You can send a screenshot of the notification to bilges-roar-95@icloud.com, with the email subject "V Station Lottery".

## 4. Finally

1. Everyone is suitable for different English learning methods. Some people learn quickly and do not encounter too much resistance; others cannot learn no matter how they try and cannot continue learning. If you have not encountered this kind of problem before, please do not try this tool.
2. The tool is a bit expensive because adding custom sentences requires a large model. The number of tokens issued each month has not yet been determined. But I can guarantee that my profit will not exceed 1/5 of the purchase price.
You can contact me on X for problem feedback. I will also post instructions for use and function updates there: [My twitter](https://x.com/KuoScript)
A very important point, the key to learning English is really not sentences, syntax, or the like.
The key is vocabulary.
I don't want to start a war, I just want LZ not to go in the wrong direction.
Why is the UI so similar to Mirra for learning Japanese?
